allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
\(feat\): phase 0-2 indexing + chunking + CLI bridge

- Diff-aware indexing engine with chunk_hash tracking
- Boundary-aware file chunker \(150-line target, 10-line overlap\)
- File discovery via git ls-files / git diff
- ensureIndexed\(\) lazy trigger wired into search + task
- Grep-based search on chunks table \(ILIKE\)
- CLI: rlm index, rlm index --force, rlm index --status
- Migration 002: chunks table with pgvector column, repo index state
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
\(feat\): phase 3 — local embeddings + hybrid vector search

- Local embedding via @huggingface/transformers \(Xenova/bge-small-en-v1.5, 384d\)
- ensureEmbedded\(\) lazy pipeline — embed only NULL chunks, skip cached
- Hybrid search: grep + pgvector cosine similarity + merge/rerank
- Graceful degradation: embedding failure falls back to grep
- BGE prefix convention: "passage:" for docs, "query:" for search
- Migrations 003-004: IVFFlat index, dimension fix 1536→384
EOF
\)")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_708636f45b2d49f0__ echo "=== CHECK 1: Search trace recording ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_e27817fdf8970a0b__ echo "=== CHECK 1: Verify search trace in DB ===")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_8555e620d8fb1f34__ echo "=== CHECK 2: Runner with trace_type ===")
